Articles.Content: Hey guys. I've just come back to KSP after around a five year hiatus. I thought I had read somewhere awhile back that with REMOTE Tech that it would connect to multiple different launch sites around Kerbin and not just the KSC. HOWEVER. I don't see any of the other launch centers and I only have connection to KSC. WHAT do I need to do to be able to view these other launch sites? I'm playing in Sandbox BTW.

Welcome to the forum @ATGStreamer. I've moved your question to gameplay questions and I just wanted to check that you have the Making History expansion and that you have enabled extra ground stations in settings.
Ohh. That is probably the issue! I do have it but have not enabled anything at all. Where would that option be at?

7 minutes ago, ATGStreamer said:

Where would that option be at? 


It's an option when you set up a new game: When you select 'start new' you should see difficulty options, click on it, click advanced (on the left) and the last option is 'enable extra ground stations'. I'm not sure if there is a way to change this in an existing save.

Two extra launchsites get added with Making History, and can be toggled when starting a new game with the basic option "Enable Extra Launchsites" They can be used for comm connections, but are pretty weak in my experience.

In the advanced settings you can toggle extra ground stations under the CommNet range modifiers. These are pretty OP and solve almost all comm problems as long as you have an antenna.

In game, if you open the pause menu, click settings and the Difficulty Settings, you can change difficulty settings after starting a game.
